description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Burkina Faso vs Kenya in the Friendlies
title: Burkina Faso vs Kenya: Friendlies stats & head-to-head
title_page: Burkina Faso vs Kenya: Friendlies stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Goal!
Goal! Burkina Faso 1, Kenya 1. Aboubacar Traoré (Burkina Faso) header from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Alla Franck Alain Kanté.
Booking
Patrick Malo (Burkina Faso) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.
Goal!
Goal! Burkina Faso 0, Kenya 1. James Kinyanjui (Kenya) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal.
